SELECT i.status inquiryStatus, i.requestForQuotationId, i.createTime, i.createName, l.legalPersonName, i.type, i.currencyCode, i.isTax, i.startTime, i.endTime FROM inquiry i LEFT JOIN legalperson l ON l.id = i.legalPersonId WHERE i.requestForQuotationId = #{requestForQuotationId}

SELECT i.currencyCode, r.unit measurementUnit, r.replacementCode spareCoding, r.replacementName spareName, i.type, ir.inquiryQty, ir.moq, ir.deliveryCycle FROM inquiry_replacement ir LEFT JOIN replacement r ON r.replacementCode = ir.replacementCode LEFT JOIN inquiry i ON i.requestForQuotationId = ir.requestForQuotationId WHERE i.requestForQuotationId = #{requestForQuotationId}
SELECT s.code vendorCode, s.name vendor FROM inquiry_supplier ins LEFT JOIN supplier s ON s.code = ins.supplierCode WHERE ins.requestForQuotationId = #{requestForQuotationId}
